Module sims.custpoint
Package sims.custpoint.dao

Class DBUsers

java.lang.Object
sims.custpoint.dao.DBUsers
public class DBUsers extends Object
A class holding static methods for communication with the User table in the database linked in the JDBC class. Contains all CRUD actions as well as a user/password validation method.

  • Method Details

    • findUser

      public static boolean findUser(String userName)
      Before validating the user's password, check if the database contains an entry for the username itself.
      Parameters:
      userName - Username provided by the user's input into the Login screen.
      Returns:
      A boolean representing a successful fetch of a matching username in the database.

    • matchUser

      public static User matchUser(String userName, String password)
      Determines if there is an Users table entry matching both the provided username and password.
      Parameters:
      userName - Username provided by the user's input into the Login screen.
      password - Password provided by the user's input into the Login screen.
      Returns:
      A boolean representing a successful fetch of a matching user from the database.

    • createUser

      public static boolean createUser(String userName, String password)
      Inserts a new user into the User table.
      Parameters:
      userName - The chosen username for the new user.
      password - The chosen password for the new user.
      Returns:
      A boolean representing a successful insertion into the database.

    • getUsers

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<User> getUsers()
      Returns an ObservableList-type list of Users queried from the database. Holds all User IDs, usernames, and passwords.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList-type list of User objects.

    • updateUser

      public static boolean updateUser(int userID, String userName, String userPassword)
      Allows a user to change a given user's username and/or password.
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique user ID tied to the particular user seeking to update their information.
      userName - The desired username for the user ID to be tied to, whether changed or remaining the same.
      userPassword - The desired password for the user ID to be tied to, whether changed or remaining the same.
      Returns:
      A boolean representing a successful insertion into the database.

    • deleteUser

      public static boolean deleteUser(int userID)
      Allows a user to remove a given user from the User table based on the entry's unique ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique user ID of the User table entry to be removed.
      Returns:
      A boolean representing a successful deletion from the database.
